description: Try our easy to follow Garlic & Thyme Beef Marinade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlic & Thyme Beef Marinade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to cook, drain excess marinade from meat. Cook on the char grill turning once until cooked to your liking. Allow 3-4 minutes each side for medium, depending on the thickness of the meat.
